name: My API
title: My API

api_list.name: setSwitch
setSwitchTimer
api_list.description: sets a switch to a specific value on a timer

api_list.name: setDimmerTimer
api_list.description: sets a dimmer to a specific value on a timer

api_list.name: setDimmer
setHeaterState
api_list.description: turns the heater on or off

api_list.name: register
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-api95.p.rapidapi.com/devices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-api95.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-api95.p.rapidapi.com/devices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-api95.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
